EmailTemplate.name: Matthew Bradford.Matthew Bradford
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You, Matthew - Here's Your Avatar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header> <http://vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/Avatars/SP_MatthewBradford.jpg>
Dear Matthew,
Thank you.
I cannot adequately express my gratitude for your attendance and participation in last week’s first annual Octurbofest user group. For VMTurbo as a company, there could be no experience more humbling than to share a day with the early adopting – and actively considering – individuals who will undoubtedly propel the field of IT into a new era of promise and innovation.
I hope that we delivered everything you wanted from the day, that this was merely one touch point in a longer dialogue, and that the momentum brings you back a year hence.
How 'bout them Bruins?
Sincerely,
J. Benjamin H. Nye CEO
VMTurbo, Inc.
View the entire Octurbofest Yearbook here <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/docs/DOC-1133> 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
